title: fix: add check that the readme sample cfg is accepted by log4rs
docs: Apply markdownlint to all files
body: Applies in 2 steps as to apply special rules for changelogs.

title: Move test to example
body: Move the old test to the examples folder. Aligns better with our new format. Fixed a typo in raw.rs where default keyword was accidentally on a new line.

title: docs: Update CHANGELOG for new release
body: Title says it all. Thoughts on waiting for #302 / #335?

title: apply no_color w/ windows cfg
body: Test MR to add windows support to #302

title: Changed the order of the field in json log output
body:
I've changed the order of the fields for JSON output for better observability when logs are dumped in a file and require eye inspection.

I believe the following order

time - level - message - (rest of the log fields)... 

for the logs output would be better to catch the desired logs...

title: Fix quickstart log4rs.yaml sample
body: Fails parsing the current config. Seems to have been changed accidentally as it doesn't make sense that root and logger are defined within appenders.

title: chore: update deprecated merge_imports && fmt
body:
# What does this PR do

1. `merge_imports` is deprecated now, update it to `imports_granularity`.
2. Format code

title: ci: Update CI and add Code Coverage
doc: fix msrv badge
body: @estk Fixing the version from 1.56 -> 1.67 the current MSRV of the project.

title: ci: add auditing and fix cve
body: Address #299 and adds a CI check to ensure compliance going forward.

title: chore(deps): Bump deps
body:
Glad to see the PR moving again.
This PR will bump a series of dependencies.

 Bump `arc-swap` from 1.2 to 1.6.
 Bump `humantime` from 2.0 to 2.1.
 Bump `serde_yaml` from 0.8.4 to 0.9.
 Bump `toml` from 0.5 to 0.8.
 Bump `parking_lot` from 2.0 to 2.1.
 Bump `derivative` from 2.1.1 to 2.2.
 Bump `tempfile` from 3.1.0 to 3.8.

title: chore: update Rust version for latest log crate compatibility
body: Upgrade minimum rust version to 1.60 to allow usage of the latest log crate.

title: Add documentation covering all current aspects of the configuration file
body:
Add a markdown document detailing all the configuration options provided by log4rs.

Fixes: #291
Fixes: #304
Fixes: #306

title: feat(encode/pattern): add debug and release formatters
body:
Fixes #300 

-------
#### What this PR does:

1. Add `D`/`debug` and `R`/`release` pattern formatters.

title: add trigger kind "time" in rolling_file
body: I add the trigger kind "time" in rolling_file. It can be set with limit like 5second, 10minute, 1day, 3weeks...It may be able to solve the Issue #235. I referred to #139  and thank for @SSebo

title: Create an example of logging with file rotation
body: I've also added a small snippet at the bottom to generate log message. I can remove this if it is not desirable

title: Fixed window roller expand env var
body: This PR implements expanding env vars in file patterns in `FixedWindowRoller` as requested here https://github.com/estk/log4rs/issues/280 .

title: fix:Update typemap to use orphanage-rs impl
body:
Moves the typemap to point at the orphanage-rs implementation so we can address CVEs
Signed-off-by: Anton Whalley <anton@venshare.com>
